title: OMAC Camo Jerseys by Endo Customs
content:
Los Angeles-based OMAC has a run of disruptive patterning jerseys made in house by Endo Customs. The patterning is inspired by some of the most iconic camo designs but with a modern spin, bringing in bright, vibrant and contrasting colors with traditional tones. Theyâ€™ve got base layers, road jerseys, and casual riding/running jerseys, all made in Los Angeles.

Roll on over to OMAC to see more.

The post OMAC Camo Jerseys by Endo Customs appeared first on The Radavist.
author: John Watson
